mouseTouchscreen.title: ä½¿ç”¨é¼ æ ‡/è§¦æ‘¸å±
mouseTouchscreen.content:
Letâ€™s Play: Mouse & Touchscreen Basics

Ready to explore? Your mouse and touchscreen are your magic wands for the digital world!

Mouse Fun:

  • â€¢ Point: Move the mouse and watch the arrow follow you!
  • â€¢ Click: Press the left button to select things. Try clicking on a button below!
  • â€¢ Double Click: Quickly press twice to open files or programs.
  • â€¢ Right Click: Press the right button for a secret menu.
  • â€¢ Scroll: Roll the wheel to move up and down a page.

Touchscreen Tricks:

  • â€¢ Tap: Gently touch the screen to select.
  • â€¢ Swipe: Slide your finger to scroll or switch screens.
  • â€¢ Pinch: Move two fingers together or apart to zoom in and out.
  • â€¢ Long Press: Hold your finger down for more options (like right click!).

Try It Out!

  • â€¢ Move your mouse and see what changes on the screen.
  • â€¢ Tap and swipe on your device to explore.
keyPoints: The mouse pointer follows your hand!
Left click is your main action.
Touchscreens let you tap, swipe, and zoom!
mouseTouchscreen.practiceExercise: Try clicking, double-clicking, and right-clicking on your desktop. On a touchscreen, tap and swipe to move between screens.
mouseTouchscreen.animationDesc: Watch how to click, double-click, and swipe on a touchscreen.

update.description: A new version of TechStep is available with improvements and bug fixes.

notifications.description: Get gentle reminders to help you stay on track with your learning journey.
notifications.learning_reminders_desc: Gentle nudges to continue your lessons

blocked.title: Notifications Blocked
blocked.description: Notifications are currently blocked. To enable them, please allow notifications in your browser settings.
blocked.instructions: Look for the notification icon in your address bar or check your browser's site settings.

success.title: Notifications Enabled!
success.description: You'll receive helpful reminders and updates based on your preferences.

settings.dataRightsDesc: You have complete control over your personal data. Export, manage sharing preferences, or delete your data at any time.

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
items: We will NEVER sell your personal data
All data stays encrypted and secure
You can change these settings anytime
You can delete your data at any time

personalization.title: Personalized Experience
personalization.description: Allow us to use your interaction data to provide better, more relevant help and suggestions tailored to your needs.
personalization.note: This helps us understand what topics you're most interested in and provide more relevant tutorials.

history.title: Use Conversation History
history.description: Remember our previous conversations to provide better context and avoid repeating information you already know.
history.note: This helps me remember what we've discussed before and build on previous conversations.

learningPrefs.title: Use Learning Preferences
learningPrefs.description: Remember your preferred learning style, communication preferences, and accessibility needs to provide consistent experiences.
learningPrefs.note: This includes your preferred explanation style, language settings, and accessibility preferences.

noSelection.title: No Personalization Selected
noSelection.success: Great! We'll use your selected data to provide a better experience.
noSelection.default: That's perfectly fine! You'll still get full access to all features, just without personalized recommendations.

accessibility.errorCompleting: Error completing onboarding. Please try again.
accessibility.keyboardInstructions: Use Tab to navigate, Enter to select, and Escape to close dialogs

validation.validAgeRequired: Please enter a valid age between 18 and 120
validation.languageRequired: Please select at least one language
validation.experienceRequired: Please select your tech experience level
validation.concernsOptional: You can select concerns to help us personalize your experience
validation.assistiveNeedsRequired: Please select your accessibility needs or choose 'None needed'
validation.communicationStyleRequired: Please select your preferred communication style

restart.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to restart the onboarding process? This will reset all your preferences.

error.loadFailed: Failed to load avatar. Please try again.
error.audioFailed: Could not access microphone for lip sync.

greeting.morning: Good morning, {{name}}! Ready to learn something new today?
greeting.afternoon: Good afternoon, {{name}}! How can I help you today?
greeting.evening: Good evening, {{name}}! What would you like to explore?

companion.title: Your AI Helper
companion.ready: I'm here to help you with technology!

suggestions.connectWifi: How do I connect to WiFi?
suggestions.makeTextBigger: How do I make text bigger on my screen?
suggestions.takeScreenshot: How do I take a screenshot?
suggestions.videoCall: How do I make a video call?
suggestions.iphoneSettings: How do I change iPhone settings?
suggestions.androidSettings: How do I change Android settings?
suggestions.windowsSettings: How do I change Windows settings?

welcome.title: How can I help you today?
welcome.subtitle: Ask me anything about technology!

input.helper: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
input.listening: Listening... Click avatar again to stop

error.general: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble right now. Please try again in a moment.
error.understanding: I'm sorry, I couldn't understand that.
error.connection: I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again.

overview.title: Your Data Rights
overview.description: You have complete control over your personal data. You can view, export, correct, or delete your information at any time within 30 days.

sharing.title: Data Sharing Preferences
sharing.description: Control how your data is shared and used. All sharing is optional and can be changed at any time.
sharing.analyticsDesc: Share anonymized usage data to improve the platform
sharing.researchDesc: Contribute anonymized data to senior learning research

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download a copy of all your personal data. We'll prepare your data and send you a download link within 30 days.

delete.title: Delete Your Data
delete.description: Permanently delete all your personal data. This action cannot be undone and will close your account within 30 days.
delete.analytics: Usage analytics linked to your account
delete.legal: Some data may be retained for legal compliance (support tickets, billing records)
delete.research: Anonymized data used for research may be retained
delete.verification: You will receive email verification before deletion
delete.timeframe: Deletion will be completed within 30 days
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data?
delete.type: Type "DELETE MY DATA" to confirm this action:

ai.title: AI Data Usage Transparency
ai.description: See exactly how your data is used by our AI assistant and control your AI data preferences.
ai.stopTrainingDesc: Prevent your data from improving AI responses

chat.placeholder: Type your question here... Press Enter to send

voice.instructions: Tap the microphone to start recording

image.instructions: Share a photo and I'll help explain what you see
image.contextLabel: What would you like to know about this image?
image.contextPlaceholder: Optional: Ask a specific question about the image
image.invalidType: Please select a valid image file.
image.tooLarge: Image file is too large. Please select a file under 10MB.
image.cameraError: Could not access camera. Please check permissions.

ai.title: AI Helper
ai.subtitle: Here to help you learn
ai.escalated: You're now connected with our support team

welcome.tutorial: Hello! I see you're working on "{{tutorial}}". I'm here to help you with any questions. You can type, speak, or show me images - whatever feels most comfortable for you!
welcome.general: Hello! I'm your AI assistant, here to help you learn technology step by step. You can ask me questions by typing, speaking, or showing me images. What would you like to know?

error.general: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble right now. Let me connect you with our support team who can help you immediately.

header.title: Community Forum
header.subtitle: Connect with other learners, ask questions, and share your experiences

createPost.title: Create New Post
createPost.contentPlaceholder: Describe your question or share your thoughts...
createPost.profanityAlert: Your post contains inappropriate content. Please revise and try again.

posts.empty: No posts found. Be the first to start a conversation!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.fasterResponse: ğŸ“§ This form will be answered faster than other contact methods!
form.name: Full Name *
form.subject: Subject *
form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your inquiry in detail...
form.success: Your email client should have opened. If not, please copy the information and email us directly.
form.error: There was an error. Please email us directly at taksh.nahata37@gmail.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

license.title: Use License
license.content: Permission is granted to temporarily use our service for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree to use our service in a manner consistent with all applicable laws and regulations and in accordance with these terms.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall our company or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use our service.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

accessibilityPage.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibilityPage.subtitle: We're committed to making our platform accessible to everyone, regardless of ability or technology.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: We believe technology should be accessible to everyone. Our platform is designed with seniors in mind, incorporating features that make learning technology easier and more comfortable for users of all abilities.

standards.title: Standards Compliance
standards.content: Our platform aims to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards. We regularly test our platform with assistive technologies and conduct accessibility audits.

feedback.title: Feedback and Support
feedback.content: We're continuously working to improve accessibility. If you encounter any barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please don't hesitate to contact us.

assistive.title: Assistive Technologies
assistive.content: Our platform is designed to work with common assistive technologies including:

help.title: Need Help?
help.content: If you need assistance using our platform or have accessibility-related questions, we're here to help.
